Storyline:
Ludo is a 2020 Indian treasury dim parody wrongdoing movie coordinated by Anurag Basu. It is created by Bhushan Kumar, Divya Khosla Kumar, Krishan Kumar, Anurag Basu, Tani Basu and Deepshika Bose under the pennants of T-Series, Anurag Basu Productions and Ishana Movies.It stars a gathering cast of Abhishek Bachchan, Aditya Roy Kapur, Rajkummar Rao, Pankaj Tripathi, Fatima Sana Shaikh, Sanya Malhotra, Rohit Suresh Saraf, Pearle Maaney and Inayat Varma.The film was delivered on 12 November 2020 harmonizing with Diwali on Netflix.
Ludo begins with two characters, pondering life and passing and they choose to play ludo. The game they play associates to the lives of Sattu Bhaiya (Pankaj Tripathi),Akash (Aditya Roy Kapur), Alok Kumar (Rajkummar Rao)and Bittu (Abhishek Bachchan).Sattu Bhaiya is an infamous criminal needs to dole out old retributions with Bittu, who was before his right-hand man. Sattu Bhaiya turns into the dice of Ludo and Bittu structures the red side in Ludo.Akash and Shruti (Sanya Malhotra) structures the yellow side. They find that somebody has recorded a video of them engaging in sexual relations and have transferred it to the Internet. At that point they start the competition to discover the guilty party and bring down the video before Shruti’s eventual spouse discovers out.The blue side is framed by Sheeja Thomas (Pearle Maaney)and Rahul (Rohit Suresh Saraf)Sheeja is a Malayali nurture who talks just Malayalam and Rahul is a striving youngster from an unassuming community being harassed by his chief. They discover the fortune of Sattu Bhaiya and the group pursues them and they attempt to get away (return Home).
